childMarkdownRemark.html:
Contribution This project is part of contentful-userland which means that we’re always open to contributions and pull requests. You can learn more about how contentful userland is organized by visiting our about repository.

Requirements To use this project you have to have a Contentful account. If you don't have one yet you can register at www.contentful.com/sign-up.

Getting started

Worry less about security, caching, and talking to the server. Static sites are the new thing.

Webhooks notify you, another person or system when resources have changed by calling a given HTTP endpoint.

shortBio.shortBio: Hipster web developer, at the intersection between beautiful code and overinflated narcissism.
